title: Nine Stars Killer - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Cultivation   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Godly Powers   Male Protagonist   Polygamy   Vampires   Weak to Strong
author: Tie Ma Fei Qiao   铁马飞桥
description: Ye Feng wakes up in bed. He touches his face and mutters, 'Didn't I just die in an explosion?' Suddenly he feels a headache and new memories pop into his head. He knows at once he has been reincarnated. Before this, he was a vampire who had lived underground for decades. An explosion at an abandoned factory killed him but now he had a chance to relive his life. Now he doesn't have to live in the dark anymore. But soon, he finds out that he can't give up his desire for blood…>
